LanguageData.BM_SpacerPyroweaveSupportModule.label: pyroweave module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerPyroweaveSupportModule.descript: A high-tech device that can be installed into any compatible artificial limb or spine replacement. This particular model, upon detecting an attack on the user, sends out a directional burst of highly combustible micro-gas toward the attacker through the module's vent-like openings. Due to its limited effective range it is most potent in close-quarters combat, especially against assailants within melee range.
